SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.repositories

Class OfficerRegistrationRepo

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.repositories.OfficerRegistrationRepo
All Implemented Interfaces:
RepoInterface<OfficerRegistrationModel,Long>
public class OfficerRegistrationRepo extends Object implements RepoInterface<OfficerRegistrationModel,Long>
Manages the storage and retrieval of officer registration application data. Implements the RepoInterface for standard repository operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<OfficerRegistrationModel>
    applications
    In-memory list to store all officer registration application instances.

    OfficerRegistrationRepo()

      Specified by:

    • findbyUserID

      public Optional<OfficerRegistrationModel> findbyUserID(long userID)
      Finds an officer registration application associated with a specific User ID. Assumes an officer can only have one active registration application at a time (returns the first found).
      Parameters:
      userID - The User ID of the officer.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the registration application if found, otherwise empty.

    • findActiveByOfficerID

      public Optional<OfficerRegistrationModel> findActiveByOfficerID(String userID)
      Finds the first active (non-approved, non-rejected) registration application for a given Officer User ID (provided as String).
      Parameters:
      userID - The User ID of the officer as a String.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the active registration application if found, otherwise empty.

    • findByProjectID

      public List<OfficerRegistrationModel> findByProjectID(String projectID)
      Finds all officer registration applications associated with a specific Project ID (provided as String).
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project as a String.
      Returns:
      A list of registration applications for the specified project.
